original_text: and Solomon the father of Rehoboam, and Rehoboam the father of Abijah, and Abijah the father of Asaph,
korean_text: 솔로몬은 르호보암을 낳고 르호보암은 아비야를 낳고 아비야는 아사를 낳고

sentences.original_text: and Solomon the father of Rehoboam,
and Rehoboam the father of Abijah,
and Abijah the father of Asaph,
